id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

profilePicture.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography or description of the user.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user profile was last updated.

subscriptions.description: An array of initiative IDs that the user is subscribed to.

Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a post created by a user.

content.description: The text content of the post.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the post (if any).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the post was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the post was last updated.

FriendRequest.title: FriendRequest
FriendRequest.description: Represents a friend request between two users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the friend request.

requesterId.description: Reference to UserProfile. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N FriendRequest, the user sending the request)

receiverId.description: Reference to UserProfile. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N FriendRequest, the user receiving the request)

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the friend request was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the friend request was last updated.

DirectMessage.title: DirectMessage
DirectMessage.description: Represents a direct message between two users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the direct message.

senderId.description: Reference to UserProfile. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N DirectMessage, the user sending the message)

receiverId.description: Reference to UserProfile. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N DirectMessage, the user receiving the message)

content.description: The text content of the message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was last updated.

reaction.description: An emoji reaction to the message.

Like.title: Like
Like.description: Represents a like on a post.

userId.description: Reference to UserProfile. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N Like, the user who liked the post)

postId.description: Reference to Post. (Relationship: Post 1:N Like, the post that was liked)

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the like was created.

offer.description: The WebRTC offer from the caller.

answer.description: The WebRTC answer from the callee.

Story.title: Story
Story.description: Represents an ephemeral story (or reel) created by a user.

authorId.description: Reference to the UserProfile who created the story.

mediaUrl.description: URL of the video or image for the story.

mediaType.description: The type of media in the story.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the story was created.

expiresAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the story will expire (e.g., 24 hours after creation).

Initiative.title: Initiative
Initiative.description: Represents a user-submitted initiative to be showcased.

description.description: A short description of the initiative.

websiteUrl.description: The official website URL for the initiative.

donationLink.description: A link to a payment processor for donations.

submittedBy.description: The user ID of the person who submitted the initiative.

status.description: The approval status of the submission.

subscribers.description: An array of user IDs who are subscribed to this initiative.

InitiativeMessage.title: InitiativeMessage
InitiativeMessage.description: Represents a chat message within an initiative's community chat.

senderId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

senderName.description: The name of the user who sent the message.

senderAvatarUrl.description: The avatar URL of the user who sent the message.

content.description: The text content of the message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was sent.

params.description: The unique identifier for the call.

params.name: storyId
params.description: The unique identifier for the story.

params.description: The unique identifier for the message.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to model a social networking application, 'LinkUp,' focusing on user profiles, posts, friend connections, and direct messaging. Key considerations include authorization independence, clarity of intent, and scalable security rules. The structure adheres to the principles of Authorization Independence, Structural Segregation, and explicit Access Modeling. User profiles are stored in a dedicated collection (`users/{userId}`) using path-based ownership. Posts are stored in a subcollection under each user (`users/{userId}/posts/{postId}`) to maintain ownership integrity and simplify security rules, enabling atomic operations. To display all posts in a feed, we introduce a `global_posts` collection that denormalizes the post data and includes a `authorId` field for indexing and querying. Friend requests are managed via a dedicated collection (`friend_requests`) to facilitate efficient querying. Direct messages are structured under `users/{userId}/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}` and leverages a `members` field to define user participation in the chat for authorization independence. A `calls` collection is added to handle WebRTC signaling for video and voice calls. A new `initiatives` collection is added to handle user submissions, with a `status` field to manage an approval workflow.
